DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , open-label , non-randomized , multicenter study adult , age eighteen ( 18 ) old , newly-diagnosed recurrent unresectable Stage III Stage IV melanoma . A maximum 18 subject enrol Stage 1 study . ( Stage 1 complete enrollment June 2006 . ) A maximum 39 subject enrol Stage 2 study .
